comments.author: mich
comments.body: Some thriller classics I would suggest are The Departed with Martin Sheen, Alec Baldwin, Ray Winstone, Leonardo DiCaprio, Jack Nicholson, and Matt Damon- 2006Fatal Attraction with Michael Douglas and Glenn Close- 1987Basic Instinct with Michael Douglas and Sharon Stone- 1992Prisoners wit Hugh Jackman, Jake Gyllenhaal, and Paul Dano- 2013Black Swan with Natalie Portman, Vincent Cassel, and Mila Kunis- 2010Silence Of The Lambs with Jodie Foster and Anthony Hopkins- 1991

comments.author: 44vs
comments.body: I would recommend you consider watching 'The Dark Knight (2008)' and 'Joker (2019)'. 'The Dark Knight' is a great choice if you like thriller with action, but if you prefer psychological thrillers more than 'Joker' might be a better choose for you. Here is IMDB for both of themhttps://www.imdb.com/title/tt0468569/?ref_=chttp_t_1 -- The Dark Knight (2008)https://www.imdb.com/title/tt7286456/?ref_=chttp_t_19 -- Joker (2019)
